name: PlayerContext
desc: Information about the current playback content.

items.name: activityIdentifier
items.desc: The ID for the client’s current UserActivity.

items.name: queueIdentifier
items.desc: The ID of the playback queue that contains the current content.

items.name: contentIdentifier
items.desc: The ID for the content the client is playing.

items.name: offsetInMillis
items.desc: The number of milliseconds into the playback progress of the current content.
